channel.title: Classic Fairy Tales
channel.itunes:subtitle: Classic Fairy Tales
channel.itunes:author: Alpha DVD
channel.itunes:summary: Classic Fairy Tales features 30 of the best loved Fairy Tales from the Brothers Grimm, Hans Christian Anderson, and other world-renowned storytellers.
channel.description: Classic Fairy Tales features 30 of the best loved Fairy Tales from the Brothers Grimm, Hans Christian Anderson, and other world-renowned storytellers.
channel.itunes:keywords: Fairy Tales Brothers Grimm Hans Christian Andersen

item.itunes:author: DVDBookshelf.com
item.itunes:subtitle: 12 Dancing Princesses
item.itunes:summary: A tale about 12 princesses who love to dance, and the soldier who discovers their secret.

item.itunes:subtitle: Donkeyskin
